summary: Talented security architect with broad experience in fast-paced, high-pressure enterprise-level organizations.  Essential skills include secure architecture of complex systems in cloud and on-premises environments as well as extensive Active Directory and general Windows Server design experience.  Reputation for accomplishing tasks with very high accuracy and efficiency, successfully prioritizing large amounts of work when meeting aggressive deadlines, and being a dependable team player.
